#summary Golf Markup Language Documentation: complexType Position.

== Name ==

Position (complexType)

  	

===  Super Types ===
{{{
anyType
  |
  +--Position (restriction)
}}}
----
    

===  Documentation ===
        
			Coordinate of a point. The coordinate of a point can be either a GPS coordinate or
			coordinates in any specific system.
		
  	
===  Properties ===

  	This component is not nillable.
---- 	
        
===  Model ===
{{{
          <...>  (position-gps | position-other) </...>
}}}
----
    

=== Nested Element Summary ===
        
|| [CPositionGPS.html golfml:PositionGPS] || [CPositionGPS.html position-gps] ||  					GPS coordinate of a point.				 ||
|| [CRoomForExtension.html golfml:RoomForExtension] || [CRoomForExtension.html position-other] ||  					Coordinate of a point in an arbitraty unit system.				 ||

===  Sub Types ===
{{{
    	[CPosition.html {http://code.google.com/p/golfml}Position] (restriction)  |    +--[CPositionWithSequence.html {http://code.google.com/p/golfml}PositionWithSequence] (extension)
}}}
----
    

===  Local Usage ===

    	[CPointOfInterest.html PointOfInterest], [CPositionWithSequence.html PositionWithSequence], [CStrokeDetail.html StrokeDetail]
----
